title: Something strange happened to me please riot read this
body:
So i came back from work and tried to login but couldn't so tried multiple times and nothing worked so i went to my email to check if someone stole it and could change the pass but i found is this  email from riot below 
https://imgur.com/a/MXuPJ 
and it wasn't even opened and as i remember you can't change the password without getting the verification code, this email sent me directly to change the password then i changed it twice to make sure everything is fine  so this is strange please check if someone is hacking your servers or so because this is strange i am 100% sure that my accounts are safe and secured thanks in advance

replies.body: If your password was reset and you had a password reset email, your account had been compromised as well as your email most likely. I'd suggest changing the password on your email as well to be extra safe.
